title: Comic Artists Are Waging a War, and We Joined the Frontlines

media:group.media:title: Comic Artists Are Waging a War, and We Joined the Frontlines
media:group.media:description:
We entered the War for Rayuba, one of the largest Original Character Tournaments in the world.

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames

NOTE: As of August 2021, this tournament is finished and not accepting new participants, but you can still find all of our links below.

Anni’s intro comic https://imgur.com/a/YZ3p7Ce
Peggy vs Eris (Anni’s comic) https://imgur.com/a/bWpXuXm
Peggy vs Eris (Septi’s comic) https://imgur.com/gallery/AjCX3Iz
 
Kill Six Billion Demons: https://killsixbilliondemons.com/
The Rayuba Archive (search the war's comics here): https://xrabohrok.github.io/WarMap/#/

Huge thanks to the following artists for letting us show their work!
